caption.p:
Z-guggulsterone alters TGF- β 1, VEGF, and TNF- α levels in SGC-7901 cells. SGC-7901 (a) and GES-1 (b) cells were treated with 0, 15, 50, or 75 µM of z-guggulsterone for 24 h. TGF- β1, VEGF, and TNF- α levels in the culture medium were investigated using ELISA. Data are expressed as means ± SD.
∗
p < 0.05 vs. untreated cells. Z-gug, z-guggulsterone.
